name: Maya Block Puzzle
description:
The game you see now is a maya - style gem game.When you open the game, you are attracted to the exquisite gem block. You don't feel tired when you play for two hours.

GAME FEATURES :
• Block puzzle classic Challenge
• Funny sound effects
• Various Blocks and colorful graphic
• Simple rules and Easy control
• Smooth and delicate animation
• Hours of fun, exciting play

Remember, MAYA BLOCK PUZZLE is a must-have for you to wait for the bus, take the subway, or even go to the bathroom！Sincerely hope you enjoy it!
